text:
Perfect! ✅ 

Your DeepL clone now has the languages beautifully organized with **Northern European languages at the top** (including Danish in the 2nd position), followed by Southern European languages, and then other world languages at the bottom.

The language dropdown in your translator at `http://localhost:3000` will now show:
1. 🔍 Detect language
2. 🇬🇧 English  
3. 🇩🇰 **Danish** (prominently placed!)
4. 🇸🇪 Swedish
5. 🇳🇴 Norwegian
... and so on in the geographic order you requested.

This makes it much more user-friendly for Northern European users! 🚀
